event.name: PROFES 2025

workshops.name: QuEMaLeS 2025
workshops.description: Workshop on Quality Evaluation of Machine Learning Software Systems
topics: Quality models and metrics for ML-based systems

workshops.name: PATH 2025
workshops.description: Promoting and Dealing with Advanced Technology in Healthcare
topics: Secure data management and privacy in healthcare software
Ethical and regulatory issues in AI for healthcare
Evaluation methodologies and real-world case studies

workshops.name: A-SPPI 2025
workshops.description: International Workshop on Analytics for Software Product and Process Improvement
topics: Analysis of software data to support decision making
AI and machine learning for software analytics
Teaching software analytics and process improvement

event.submission_guidelines: All submissions must be in English, original, and not under review or published elsewhere. Papers must conform to the Springer LNCS formatting guidelines. Accepted papers will be published in a Lecture Notes in Computer Science (LNCS) proceedings volume. At least one author of each accepted paper must register for the workshop and present the work.
event.closing: We look forward to your contributions and to seeing you in Salerno at PROFES 2025.

footer.contribution_information: To contribute to SEWORLD, send your submission to mailto:[log in to unmask]
footer.resources: http://sigsoft.org/resources/seworld.html provides more information on SEWORLD as well as links to a complete archive of messages posted to the list.
